roleset.name: natural disaster: mudslide
roleset.note: MUDSLIDE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor, comparison to avalanche, landslide, rockslide, lahar. (from mudslide.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: mudslide-n
example.text: The object is to slow a 50 mph mudslide down to 5-10 mph to allow the sediment to settle.

example.name: mudslide-n: with arg1
example.text: ...and sent a half-million-tonne mudslide of liquefied coal slurry down onto the village.
